cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 30 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Superior Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our comfy Twin Room has 2 x Single Beds, complete with luxury pillows, linen and towels supplied in our superior 2-bedroom apartment (Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom, so a maximum of 2 other guests at any one time)

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our cozy Superior Queen Room features luxury bedding and pillows makes this room a snuggly spot for relaxing & sleeping. Towels provided. Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom means you share the apartment with a maximum of 2 other guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Deluxe Queen Room sleeps a maximum of 2 x people. Luxury linen and towels provided. Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom means you are sharing the apartment with a maximum of 3 other guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Triple/Twin Room is configured with a Double and Single Bed combo, sleeping a maximum of 3x people. Luxury linen and towels provided. Sharing this apartment with one other bedroom means you are sharing the apartment with a maximum of 2 other guests.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 22:59 23rd Sep 2025 (NZST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 22:59 23rd Sep 2025 (NZST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
